TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChannelListener implements class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 定义必须由通道侦听器实现来接受通道的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface that must be implemented by a channel listener to accept channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口表示通道侦听器的基接口。The interface represents the base interface for channel listeners. 通道侦听器及其关联通道通常由接收客户端启动的通信的服务使用。Channel listeners and their associated channels are generally used by services that receive communications initiated by clients. 与此相反，实现 接口的通道工厂则提供一些机制用于创建通道，与服务的通信是通过这些通道启动的。Channel factories that implement the interface, by contrast, provide the mechanisms used to create the channels through which communication with a service is initiated.

public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginWaitForChannel(TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: timeout
param.span: ，指定在超时前可用于完成等待通道操作的时间长度。

span.span: The that specifies how long the wait for a channel operation has to complete before timing out.

param.name: callback
param.span: 接收异步等待通道操作完成通知的 委托。

span.span: The delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous completion of the wait for a channel operation.

param.span: 一个由应用程序指定的对象，它包含与异步等待通道操作相关联的状态信息。

span.span: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous wait for a channel operation.

summary.span: 开始一个等待通道到达的异步操作，此操作必须在指定时间间隔内完成。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to wait for a channel to arrive that must be completed within a specified interval of time.

returns.span: 引用异步等待通道操作的 。

span.span: The that references the asynchronous wait for a channel operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public T GetProperty<T> () where T : class;
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!T GetProperty<class T>() cil managed
Public Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) () As T

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 方法正在查询的类型化对象。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.

summary.span: 从通道堆栈的适当层返回所请求的类型化对象（如果存在）。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the channel stack.

returns.span: 如果存在，则返回所请求的类型化对象 ，如果不存在，则返回 。

span.span: The typed object requested, if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可请求从通道堆栈的适当层返回一个类型化对象，如用于设置属性或获取状态的接口。Use this method to request a typed object such as an interface for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the channel stack. 如果某个层支持返回所请求的对象，则该层会返回对象。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支持，则该层会将调用委托给堆栈中的下一层。If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有通道层支持所请求的对象，则该方法返回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no channel layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`.

summary.span: 获取工厂生成的侦听器进行侦听的 URI。

span.span: Gets the URI on which the listeners that are generated by the factory listen.

value.span: 工厂生成的侦听器进行侦听的 。

span.span: The on which the listeners that are generated by the factory listen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 URI 表示 为消息侦听的传输地址。This URI represents the transport address on which the is listening for messages.
